Reboot

This past year has been filled with a great deal of change for me. Almost one year ago in March 2014, I left eGovernment provider NIC after nine years. It was an extremely hard decision, but one I felt necessary for my growth and professional development. Since then, I’ve joined up with the talented team at Ad Hoc LLC, serving as creative director. The applications we’re building are already helping millions of Americans interact with government, and we’re just getting started. I can’t wait to share more.

February 12, 2015 by Danny Chapman
